layer.origins-classes.class.name: Profession
layer.origins-classes.class.missing_orig: You do not have a profession.
layer.origins-classes.playstyle.name: Class
layer.origins-classes.playstyle.missing_: You do not have a proficiency.
power.origins-classes.warrior_buffs.name: Melee Proficiency
power.origins-classes.warrior_buffs.desc: Able to use melee weapons proficiently. Can't wield magic to its full potential. Bows and Crossbows are too intricate for you.
Basic Equipment every warrior needs are provided from your army days.
power.origins-classes.warrior_levels.des: You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
power.origins-classes.warrior_heavy_weap: Dual-handed weapons are your forte. You'll deal more damage with them, but you'll be slower.
power.origins-classes.archer_buffs.name: Ranged Proficiency
power.origins-classes.archer_buffs.descr: Able to use bows and crossbows proficiently. Swords are for nitwits, and magic is inherently flawed.
power.origins-classes.archer_equipment.d: The equipment you've gathered from your time in the tavern. It's not much, but it's something.
power.origins-classes.archer_levels.name: Hunt's Beginning
power.origins-classes.archer_levels.desc: You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
origin.origins-classes.mage.name: Mage
origin.origins-classes.mage.description: Wielder of the arcane arts. You've spent years studying the magical arts, and you're ready to put your knowledge to the test.
power.origins-classes.mage_buffs.name: Arcane Proficiency
power.origins-classes.mage_buffs.descrip: Able to use magic proficiently. Any other form of combat is too primitive for you.
power.origins-classes.mage_equipment.des: When you left the college, you took your robes with you. They're only student robes, but they're better than nothing.
power.origins-classes.mage_levels.name: College Education
power.origins-classes.mage_levels.descri: You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
power.origins-classes.mage_loot.name: Mystical Attuned Eyes
power.origins-classes.mage_loot.descript: You tend to see details that others don't. You'll find more magical items in chests that others would overlook.
origin.origins-classes.rogue.name: Rogue
origin.origins-classes.rogue.description: Fast and nimble, you zoom around the battlefield.
power.origins-classes.rogue_buffs.name: Critical Criticality
power.origins-classes.rogue_buffs.descri: Your critical chance is increased when using small melee (daggers, claws, sais) or ranged weapons (shortbows). Any other weapons will be debuffed. Magic is not your cup of tea either.
power.origins-classes.rogue_equipment.de: You're starting out with some light armor and two daggers. Management is not responsible for any injuries.
power.origins-classes.rogue_levels.name: Thieves Guild Initiation
power.origins-classes.rogue_levels.descr: You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
power.origins-classes.rogue_dashes.name: Zooming is my Middle Name
power.origins-classes.rogue_dashes.descr: Your agility is unmatched. You have 2 dashes that recharge quicker than others.
origin.origins-classes.tank.name: Tank
origin.origins-classes.tank.description: You're the one that takes the hits so others don't have to.
power.origins-classes.tank_buffs.name: Built different
power.origins-classes.tank_buffs.descrip: You deal less damage in general, but your health, armor, and resistances are increased. Knockback is also reduced.
power.origins-classes.tank_equipment.des: You're starting out with some heavy armor, a sword and a shield. Will take you a long way.
power.origins-classes.tank_levels.name: Guardian's Oath
power.origins-classes.tank_levels.descri: You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
origin.origins-classes.all_rounder.name: All-Rounder
origin.origins-classes.all_rounder.descr: You're decent at everything, but not the best at anything.
You're have some small debuffs to all combat types (magic included), but you're not bad at any of them.
power.origins-classes.all_rounder_equipm: You're starting out with some basic supplies. Nothing too fancy, but it'll get you started.
power.origins-classes.all_rounder_levels: You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
power.origins-classes.blacksmith_equipme: Starting equipment for a blacksmith, including an anvil to forge your creations.
You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
power.origins-classes.cleric_equipment.d: Essential supplies for a cleric, including a bundle filled with potion ingredients.
power.origins-classes.cleric_levels.name: Cleric's Blessing
power.origins-classes.cleric_levels.desc: You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
power.origins-classes.cook_equipment.des: Starting supplies for a cook, including a smoker and various meats.
power.origins-classes.cook_levels.name: Culinary Expertise
power.origins-classes.cook_levels.descri: You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
power.origins-classes.farmer_equipment.d: Starting tools for a farmer, including seeds and a copper hoe.
power.origins-classes.farmer_levels.name: Agricultural Wisdom
power.origins-classes.farmer_levels.desc: You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
power.origins-classes.lumberjack_equipme: Starting equipment for a lumberjack, including a copper axe.
You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
power.origins-classes.merchant_equipment: Starting equipment for a merchant, including a bundle filled with emeralds. Not to the brim though.
power.origins-classes.merchant_levels.de: You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
power.origins-classes.miner_equipment.de: Starting equipment for a miner, including a copper pickaxe.
power.origins-classes.miner_levels.name: Miner's Dedication
power.origins-classes.miner_levels.descr: You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
Starting equipment for a rancher, including leads for animals.
power.origins-classes.rancher_levels.des: You'll be granted a potion that will set your initial levels. Use it immediately to kickstart your journey! Or don't, you do you...
origin.origins-classes.apicultor.name: Apicultor
origin.origins-classes.apicultor.descrip: You've grown up around bees, and you know how to handle them.
power.origins-classes.friendly_bees.name: Friendly Bees
power.origins-classes.friendly_bees.desc: Whenever you collect honey or honeycombs from a beehive, the bees won't be mad at you.
power.origins-classes.apicultor_equipmen: You're starting out with a bundle filled with some hives, shears, an insect net, and some flowers.
